categories: Category:Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace voice actors

nodes.text: Peter Serafinowicz (July 10, 1972) is an English actor, voice actor, comedian and writer. Serafinowicz was the first actor to provide the voice for Darth Maul in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, dubbing his voice over that of Ray Park for grunts and for each of the three lines that the character had in the film. He also provided the voice for a Gungan scout and 2163 but wasn't credited for it in the film. Serafinowcz did initial recordings as Maul for Solo: A Star Wars Story, but was replaced by Sam Witwer, who had voiced the character in Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Star Wars Rebels.

Serafinowicz is also known for portraying Shaun and Ed's roommate, Peter, in the British comedy Shaun of the Dead. Serafinowicz played Duane Benzie, Simon Pegg's girlfriend-stealing nemesis in the British series, Spaced, even reusing a version of Darth Maul's line, "At last we will have revenge." The role of Chef on South Park was passed to Serafinowicz at the last moments of Episode 1001 The Return of Chef. Chef took on the appearance of Darth Vader, complete with red spatula.
